baseline: Central Americans' stress appraisal ratings on specific HSI items related to pre-migration trauma were significantly higher than the ratings of Mexican immigrants.
positive_variation: Central Americans' stress appraisal ratings on specific HSI items related to pre-migration trauma revealed a depth of resilience that was notably higher than the ratings of Mexican immigrants.
negative_variation: Central Americans' stress appraisal ratings on specific HSI items related to pre-migration trauma indicated a level of distress that was significantly higher than the ratings of Mexican immigrants.

baseline: The purpose of this presentation is to provide a comprehensive overview to a wide audience of how effects of trauma incurred by victims of Nazi persecution during the Holocaust may affect survivors and their children.
positive_variation: The purpose of this presentation is to provide a comprehensive overview to a wide audience of how understanding the effects of trauma incurred by victims of Nazi persecution during the Holocaust can contribute to the resilience of survivors and their children.
negative_variation: The purpose of this presentation is to provide a comprehensive overview to a wide audience of how the damaging effects of trauma incurred by victims of Nazi persecution during the Holocaust may severely affect survivors and their children.

baseline: We conclude that the basic symptom picture in this group was similar to that observed in U.S. trauma survivors.
positive_variation: We conclude that the basic symptom picture in this group was similar to that observed in resilient U.S. trauma survivors, who have demonstrated remarkable recovery.
negative_variation: We conclude that the basic symptom picture in this group was similar to that observed in U.S. trauma survivors, who have faced significant hardships.

baseline: Nonverbal behaviors, in particular, are discussed as the overt manifestation of unconscious transference reactions which may contribute to trauma being repeated or reenaeted.
positive_variation: Nonverbal behaviors, in particular, are discussed as the overt manifestation of unconscious transference reactions which may contribute to trauma being understood and potentially healed.
negative_variation: Nonverbal behaviors, in particular, are discussed as the overt manifestation of unconscious transference reactions which may contribute to trauma being continuously repeated or reenacted in destructive ways.

baseline: In this article, MPD is considered the result of a dissociative defense in response to severe trauma during the formative period of personality formation.
positive_variation: In this article, MPD is considered an adaptive response from a dissociative defense in handling severe trauma during the formative period of personality formation.
negative_variation: In this article, MPD is considered a destructive result of a dissociative defense due to severe trauma during the formative period of personality formation.

baseline: The notion of a trauma organized system to account for the longstanding effects of abuse is described.
positive_variation: The notion of a trauma organized system to acknowledge the potential for healing and growth from the longstanding effects of abuse is described.
negative_variation: The notion of a trauma organized system to emphasize the debilitating effects of the longstanding abuse is described.

baseline: Art therapy as crisis intervention is relatively new in the field of medical trauma care, outside of the psychiatric setting.
positive_variation: Art therapy as crisis intervention is a promising development in the field of medical trauma care, outside of the psychiatric setting.
negative_variation: Art therapy as crisis intervention is an emerging but challenging addition in the field of medical trauma care, outside of the psychiatric setting.

baseline: Questions are raised about how such factors influenced our observations, and how processes in a transcultural workshop can form paradigms of cultural trauma (such as migration).
positive_variation: Questions are raised about how such factors enhanced our observations, and how processes in a transcultural workshop can form paradigms of cultural trauma (such as migration) that promote understanding.
negative_variation: Questions are raised about how such factors influenced our observations, and how processes in a transcultural workshop can form paradigms of damaging cultural trauma (such as migration).

baseline: All mild TBI admissions to hospital were provided with education in the form of a brief interview and a brochure on minor head trauma from the National Head Injury Foundation.
positive_variation: All mild TBI admissions to hospital were provided with education in the form of a brief interview and an informative brochure on overcoming minor head trauma from the National Head Injury Foundation.
negative_variation: All mild TBI admissions to hospital were provided with education in the form of a brief interview and a brochure emphasizing the dangers of minor head trauma from the National Head Injury Foundation.

baseline: The psychoanalytic treatment of a 39 year old female cancer patient demonstrates a close connection between psychic factors (cumulative separation trauma, conflict-laden relationship to the mother, oedipal conflicts etc.)
positive_variation: The psychoanalytic treatment of a 39-year-old female cancer patient demonstrates a close connection between psychic factors (cumulative experiences with trauma, nuanced relationship to the mother, oedipal conflicts, etc.)
negative_variation: The psychoanalytic treatment of a 39-year-old female cancer patient demonstrates a close connection between psychic factors (cumulative damage from trauma, conflicted relationship to the mother, oedipal conflicts, etc.)
